data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Khuzestan, Iran not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Khuzestan, Iran
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Khuzestan, Iran by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 191 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Khuzestan, Iran that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Khuzestan access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Bakhtiari people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Bakhtiari people.
Spirit, defend the church in the state of Khuzestan against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Khuzestan, Iran need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Khuzestan, Iran today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

location.name: Khuzestan
location.cities_list: Ahvaz, Khorramshahr, Masjed Soleymān, Al Fāw, Behbahān
location.cities_list_w_pop: Ahvaz (841,145), Khorramshahr (330,606), Masjed Soleymān (111,510), Al Fāw (104,569), Behbahān (79,327)
